Prowess
[i]Pair Up[/i] – Whenever Robin, Trusted Tactician attacks a player, if exactly one other creature is attacking that player, look at the top seven cards of your library. You may reveal a noncreature card from among them. Put the revealed card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
[i]Promote[/i] – At the beginning of your end step, if you cast three or more noncreature spells this turn, transform Robin.
Partner with Chrom, Leader of the Shepherds
